product_name: SealLine Small HP Map Case - 13.25" x 11"
long_description: The watertight SealLine HP map case is perfect for adventure racing, cycling and boating. It offers PVC-free visibility, versatility and durability. Keep your maps and trail notes dry with this waterproof case, sized to accommodate Green Trails(R) maps and standard-size sheets of paper. High-performance map case is built with a rip-and-stick, roll-down closure for waterproof submersible integrity. Trimmed with lash tabs to connect to kayak deck webbing or backpack. Pliable transparent urethane construction lets you navigate in any weather. Interior dimensions: 12.25 x 9.5 in.
short_description: The watertight SealLine HP map case is perfect for adventure racing, cycling and boating. It offers PVC-free visibility, versatility and durability.
